name: Best Com. ASHP CC (RST)
_description: Typical size light commercial rooftop HP unit that meets the best available performance level in 2020, cold-climate, replace resistance

market_entry_year_source.notes: Assume historical penetration is captured in baseline

energy_efficiency_source.notes: High efficiency RTHP performance in 2023, cooling units of EER divided by 3.412 to get to COP

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

installed_cost_source.notes: Total installed cost for high efficiency RTHP in 2023 divided by typical output capacity (90 kBtu/h); assumes no additional costs for load shifting capabilities

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average lifetimes for high efficiency RTU in 2023

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

market_scaling_fractions_source.title: CBECS 2018 - Table E1 -  Major fuels consumption by end use, 2018
market_scaling_fractions_source.fraction_derivation: Cooling fraction reflects share of primary heating that is electric (221 TBtus cooling in buildings with electric primary heating / 589 TBtus cooling in all buildings); ventilation fraction is portion of ventilation in buildings where cooling is not served by chiller 1-(230 TBtus / 728 TBtus) and heating is electric 1-(516 TBtus / 728 TBtus).
